title: After Gujarat, Karnataka plans to teach Bhagavad Gita; Congress says ‘not necessary’ - The Indian Express
content:
1. After Gujarat, Karnataka plans to teach Bhagavad Gita; Congress says ‘not necessary’  The Indian Express
  2. AAP Leader's "Raavan" Jibe On Gujarat's Bhagavad Gita-In-Syllabus Move  NDTV
  3. 'Deeds like Raavan': Sisodia's jibe to Gujarat leaders amid Gita syllabus move  Hindustan Times
  4. After Massive Hijab Row, Karnataka Government Hints At Including Bhagavad Gita In school Syllabus  India Today
  5. AAP Leader's "Raavan" Jibe On Gujarat's Bhagavad Gita-In-Syllabus Move  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Opposition party points out epics are already part of the syllabus and says though ‘people have a right to know about the culture of all religions, there is no need for including the whole the Gita in the curriculum’.
